mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO AS replyNo, PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, USER_ID AS userId, REPLY_TEXT AS replyText, REPLY_DATE AS replyDate FROM REPLY WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} ORDER BY REPLY_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, PRODUCT_NO, USER_ID, REPLY_TEXT, REPLY_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{productNo}, #{userId}, #{replyText}, SYSDATE)
